entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player when a block is broken.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the player when a block is broken.

block_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the block that is broken.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the block that is broken.

block_condition.description: If set, the specified actions will only trigger when this block condition is met by the broken block.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the specified actions will only trigger when this block condition is met by the broken block.

only_when_harvested.description: If this is true, the specified actions will only execute when the player succeeds in harvesting the block (e.g. they will not trigger when stone is broken by hand).
only_when_harvested.markdownDescription: If this is true, the specified actions will only execute when the player succeeds in harvesting the block (e.g. they will not trigger when stone is broken by hand).
